attributes.action: Bring back the Death penalty or change the law for murder Life for Life In Prision
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am asking for the Prime Minster to bring back the death penalty in this country, due to the fact that murder/cruelty resulting in the death of an innocent must be met by the full arm of the Law. If not make a life for a life if they kill then take there rights away and leave them to die in prison. Please change the Law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
